description: Try our easy to follow Tomato, Date & Apple Relish recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tomato, Date & Apple Relish Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process onion, date, ginger and garlic in a food processor until finely chopped. Transfer to a saucepan. Add tomatoes with juice, apple and vinegar. Lightly crush tomatoes with a fork. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook, stirring occasionally, for 45 minutes or until reduced and thickened. Pour into hot sterilised jars and seal. Store in the fridge for up to 1 month.
